formatName: The Neuroimaging Informatics Technology Initiative File Format
formatDescription: A Neuroimaging format commonly used in medical industry for the analysis of MRI data. Version 2 is an extended version of NIfTI allowing 64 bit storage and addressing.
provenanceCompoundName: Bodleian Library, University of Oxford / Bodleian Library, University of Oxford
